title.narrative: WASH SOUTH SYRIA

description.narrative: Syria's conflict-affected population have their critical Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) needs met, in line with the HRP and as part of the UNICEF JOP., which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Sanitation, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: MENARO delivers timely, equitable and principled humanitarian action as a complement to country office-led operations where required, including through the cross-border component of the Syria programmes as part of the Whole of Syria response.
